about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Tirupati Forge Ltd is a manufacturer and supplier of quality assured Forged Flanges, Auto Parts, Automotive Components and Fitting Components. They are an ISO 9001:2008 certified Company and engaged in manufacturing of closed die forged products like auto component, bearings, gears, etc and forged flanges of mild steel, carbon steel, stainless steel etc. based out at Hadamtala Industrial Estate, Rajkot, Gujarat. These products are used in automotive machines, vehicles and various other machines that we use in our daily life.

The company was initially set up to cater requirements of international market mainly to US and gradually, it started exporting to Italy, Morocco etc as well as in domestic market. They have equipped forge shop with all supporting facilities like in house die shop, ring rolling machines, CNC Machine Shop, CNC Drilling, Stamping Machine, Automated Paint Line etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Tirupati Forge Ltd, Plot No. 1 - 5 Survey No. 92/1, Near Shan Cement Hadamtala Industrial Area, Kotda Sangani Hadamtala Rajkot 360311

faqs.question: What is the Tirupati Forge IPO?
faqs.answer:
Tirupati Forge IPO is a SME IPO of 1800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.22 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹29 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2017, and closes on October 4, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Tirupati Forge IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Tirupati Forge IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Tirupati Forge IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Tirupati Forge IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Tirupati Forge IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Tirupati Forge IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Tirupati Forge IPO opens on September 29, 2017 and closes on October 4, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Tirupati Forge IPO?
faqs.answer: Tirupati Forge IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,16,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Tirupati Forge IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Tirupati Forge IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
